thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com
thread.title: Laura Mondello Hofacre
thread.title_full: Firmoo reviewed by Laura Mondello Hofacre

author: Laura Mondello Hofacre
title: Laura Mondello Hofacre
text: I ordered a pair of glasses and before I received them I got an email from Firmoo stating they had been damaged in shipping. The frame I chose originally was out of stock, so I picked a new one and they shipped it out faster than I expected. Not a bad first experience for a pair of glasses I only had to pay $10 shipping on, I would definitely buy from them again. Even with the issue in shipping, I am happy with my purchase and experience.
